```{r}
    null_dist <- c()

    for(i in 1:10000) {
    sample_1 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
    sample_2 <- rnorm(10,0,1)
    null_dist <- c(null_dist,mean(sample_2)-mean(sample_1))
    }
```

```{r}
    y <- hist(null_dist)
    y$density
    i <- which(y$density < 0.05)
    i
    y$breaks[i[5]]
    
```
